_sText:
This was a project I started over two years ago, but never finished. I've started mapping again recently and decided to start by finishing this and releasing it.

All credit for the original surf goes to Archangel and Lethalis, their map was the one that I learned to surf on, and I wanted to do it justice by sticking as close to the original as possible.

I hope you enjoy surfing it as much as I enjoyed remaking this classic.
